generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Giuliani considers launching an impeachment podcast amid public hearings," you may expect to read about Rudy Giuliani's potential plans to create a podcast focused on the ongoing impeachment proceedings. It may also cover his past involvement in political controversies and how that could influence the podcast's content and audience reception.
